general: Today, the position of Saturn in your sign encourages you to make thoughtful decisions. It is the perfect time to set long-term plans in motion. Your perseverance will be your greatest asset.
love: Open yourself to deep conversations; this will strengthen your bonds.
work: Focus on your goals. An unexpected opportunity may arise.
health: Take the time to relax. A short walk could work wonders.
advice: Stay true to yourself, even in uncertainty.
teaser: A day of reflection and renewal!
